title: Show HN: I built a synth for my daughter
summary:
This "Show HN" post details a maker's journey in building a portable, step-sequencer synthesizer for his daughter's third birthday. Inspired by her fascination with switches and knobs on a Montessori board, he aimed to create a tactile and creative music toy.

He started with an Arduino Inventors Kit and worked his way through building a basic MIDI controller on a breadboard. He then integrated a SAM2695 synth module and a small OLED screen for visual feedback, including a dancing panda. Development was aided by the Wokwi microcontroller simulator.

Facing challenges with available enclosures, he learned CAD and 3D-printed a custom enclosure. He initially hand-wired the circuit on a solderable breadboard but moved to designing a custom PCB using Fusion 360 after experiencing fragility issues. He addressed power supply problems by switching to a three-battery setup with an Adafruit Miniboost.

The final synth has four sliders controlling notes in a looping sequence, tempo/volume/scale/pitch controls, and a custom enclosure. The daughter enjoys using it, and the creator notes areas for improvement, like screen lag, and plans to upgrade to an ESP32.

He contemplates the potential of turning the project into a real product, acknowledging regulatory, financial, and manufacturing hurdles. He's considering open-sourcing the design for makers or launching a Kickstarter campaign and seeks advice from those with experience in small-run hardware production.

title: Replicate is joining Cloudflare
summary:
Replicate, a platform for sharing and running AI models via API, is joining Cloudflare. According to the announcement, Replicate will operate as a distinct brand but benefit from Cloudflare's resources and faster infrastructure. The existing API and deployed models will continue to function as before.

The acquisition is driven by a shared vision of building the fundamental infrastructure for AI applications. Replicate's work in defining standards for models (with Cog) and creating a platform for their deployment are seen as foundational primitives, similar to a distributed operating system for AI in the cloud. Cloudflare's robust network, including offerings like Workers, Durable Objects, and R2, are seen as complementary components for this AI infrastructure.

The goal is to build higher-level AI abstractions, facilitating model orchestration, real-time inference, and edge deployment. Replicate chose Cloudflare because of its developer-centric approach and success in building a strong enterprise business. Just as Cloudflare is the default for web app development, the combined forces aim to become the default platform for building AI applications.

title: FreeMDU: Open-source Miele appliance diagnostic tools
summary:
FreeMDU is an open-source project providing hardware and software tools for communicating with Miele appliances via their optical diagnostic interface, offering an alternative to Miele's proprietary MDU software. This interface, present in most Miele devices since 1996, allows for diagnostics and home automation integration.

The project consists of three main components: a protocol library, a terminal-based user interface (TUI) for diagnostics and testing, and firmware for a communication adapter that integrates with Home Assistant via MQTT.

While the project is experimental and carries the risk of damaging appliances if misused, it currently supports several appliance/board combinations, identified by their software ID. The article provides a table listing supported combinations. Adding support for new devices involves determining the software ID.

To get started, users need the Rust toolchain installed and a built communication adapter. Depending on the use case, users can flash the adapter with the "home" firmware in either bridge or standalone mode for device diagnostics/testing, home automation integration, or custom tool development. The TUI application is used for diagnostics and testing, while the protocol crate can be used to implement custom software.

FreeMDU is an independent project not affiliated with Miele and is licensed under the Apache 2.0 or MIT license. Contributions are welcome and will be dual-licensed under the same terms.

title: WBlock: A New Ad-Blocker for Safari
summary:
WBlock is a new, free, and open-source Safari ad-blocker for macOS, iOS, and iPadOS. It utilizes Safari's declarative content blocking API for efficient performance, boasting a ~40MB RAM footprint at idle. It uses Protocol Buffers and LZ4 compression for storage.

Key features include a 750,000 rule capacity across five Safari extensions, support for AdGuard-syntax custom filter lists, and a userscript engine implementing the Greasemonkey API. Users can also use an Element Zapper feature for manual element removal (macOS only).

WBlock offers comprehensive blocking capabilities including network request blocking, cookie and local storage filtering, CSS injection, script blocking, and pop-up/redirect prevention. Users can configure auto-update intervals, manage whitelists, and utilize regional filter support.

The technical architecture emphasizes performance with asynchronous I/O, streaming serialization, and adherence to web standards. It also uses `SafariConverterLib` and `AdGuard Scriptlets` for rule conversion and advanced blocking.

The FAQ addresses common concerns, emphasizing wBlock's performance benefits, custom filter list support, userscript functionality on iOS, configurable update frequency, and comparison to other ad blockers like uBlock Origin Lite, AdGuard, and Wipr.

title: Celtic Code: Drawing Knots with Python
summary:
This article, "Celtic Code: Drawing Knots with Python," details Tom Ruddell's project to create a web app that programmatically generates Celtic knots using Python. It begins with a brief overview of the Celtic people, their history, and the significance of knots in their culture, noting the utility and symbolic meaning of knots across various societies and time periods.

The core of the article then shifts to the technical process of coding the knot generator. Ruddell outlines the steps involved, starting with creating a grid (tile and barrier arrays) to define the knot's structure. He explains how barriers are placed to guide the knot's path and how the number of adjacent barriers is used to determine each tile's type (corner, straight, bend, diagonal). Using a compass system, the program calculates entry and exit directions for each tile. A key challenge is placing bend tiles, which involves determining their handedness and using lookup tables to find the correct entry/exit points.

Finally, the program draws the graphic using the Pillow library, creating line strokes for a visual effect. The program identifies crossing points and applies "over-crossings" to create the characteristic interwoven appearance of Celtic knots, drawing each "over" section twice. While acknowledging limitations in the method, the author highlights its simplicity and effectiveness. The article provides links to the web app and source code.

title: Show HN: Reverse perspective camera for OpenGL (Three.js)
summary:
This "Show HN" post introduces a custom OpenGL projection matrix (implemented in Three.js) that enables a smooth transition between direct perspective, orthographic projection, and reverse perspective views. This creates a radical visual effect similar to, but more extreme than, a Dolly Zoom.

The key idea is manipulating the frustum shape based on an inclination angle (p) of a single projection ray.  Positive 'p' yields direct perspective, 'p=0' yields orthographic projection, and negative 'p' yields reverse perspective. Importantly, the camera position becomes less relevant; the frustum transformation is what matters.

A "focus plane" is introduced within the near and far clip planes, maintaining a constant size during projection changes.  The projection matrix is defined assuming the camera is at the center of this focus plane, and 'p' is the tangent of the projection ray's angle passing through (1, 0, 0).

The post provides the specific form of the projection matrix and links to the `updateProjectionMatrix()` function in the GitHub repository for implementation details.  It also references Song Ho Ahn's article on projection matrices for further information. The demo, video, and repository link are included. The demo uses animated models from Three.js examples (Michelle and Littlest Tokyo) but doesn't include the models directly in the repository; they are loaded at runtime.

关键思想是基于单条投影光线的倾斜角 (p) 来操纵视锥体的形状。正 'p' 产生直接透视，'p=0' 产生正交投影，负 'p' 产生反向透视。重要的是，相机位置变得不那么重要；视锥体的变换才是关键。

在近裁剪面和远裁剪面之间引入了一个“焦点平面”，在投影变化期间保持恒定大小。假定相机位于此焦点平面的中心，并且 'p' 是通过 (1, 0, 0) 的投影光线角度的正切值，以此定义投影矩阵。

该帖子提供了投影矩阵的具体形式，并链接到 GitHub 存储库中的 `updateProjectionMatrix()` 函数以获取实现细节。它还引用了 Song Ho Ahn 关于投影矩阵的文章以获取更多信息。 演示、视频和存储库链接都包含在内。演示使用了 Three.js 示例中的动画模型（Michelle 和 Littlest Tokyo），但并未直接将模型包含在存储库中；它们是在运行时加载的。

title: Deploying Temporal on AWS ECS with Terraform

The guide covers key architecture components like VPC (Virtual Private Cloud), subnets (public and private), VPC endpoints, Internet Gateway, NAT Gateway, Amazon ECR (Elastic Container Registry), AWS Secrets Manager, ECS Cluster and Fargate, and Amazon CloudWatch for observability and auto-scaling. It also explains how data flows through the system, from client trigger to task execution and monitoring.

The setup involves storing Temporal Cloud or self-hosted Temporal Server credentials securely in AWS Secrets Manager and utilizing Terraform for infrastructure management. The Terraform project structure is organized into `bootstrap`, `global`, `live`, and `modules` directories. Auto-scaling is configured via CloudWatch alarms on CPU usage. The article highlights the benefits of this architecture, including resilience, security, cost-efficiency, scalability, and maintainability. Finally, the article lays out the prerequisites for the setup and guides the user through the process.

title: Giving C a Superpower
summary:
This article introduces `safe_c.h`, a custom C header file designed to bring safety and convenience features from C++ and Rust to C programming. It addresses common C pitfalls like memory leaks, buffer overflows, and error handling complexities.

The header provides RAII (Resource Acquisition Is Initialization) semantics using compiler-specific cleanup attributes, ensuring resources are released even on early returns or errors. It introduces "smart pointers" like `UniquePtr` for automatic memory management and `SharedPtr` for thread-safe shared resources with automated reference counting.

To tackle buffer overflows, `safe_c.h` implements type-safe, auto-growing vectors and non-owning string views and spans. Vectors automate memory management for dynamic arrays, while views and spans provide zero-cost references to substrings or array slices, avoiding unnecessary allocations.

The article also addresses C's messy error handling with Rust-inspired `Result` types, forcing explicit error handling. Combined with RAII, it simplifies cleanup and prevents resource leaks. Contracts via `requires()` and `ensures()` make function preconditions and postconditions explicit and verifiable. Finally, it replaces unsafe functions like `strcpy` with safer, bounds-checked alternatives to prevent buffer overflows. The author emphasizes that `safe_c.h` empowers C developers with increased safety and modern features, while maintaining the language's flexibility and performance. The article highlights the benefits through the author's experience building `cgrep`, a high-performance grep clone.

本文还介绍了受Rust启发的`Result`类型来解决C语言混乱的错误处理问题，强制进行显式错误处理。与RAII结合使用，简化了清理工作并防止了资源泄漏。通过`requires()`和`ensures()`实现的契约使函数的前提条件和后置条件显式且可验证。最后，它用更安全、边界检查的替代方案取代了不安全的函数（如`strcpy`），以防止缓冲区溢出。作者强调，`safe_c.h`赋予了C语言开发者更高的安全性和现代化的功能，同时保持了该语言的灵活性和性能。本文通过作者构建的高性能grep克隆程序`cgrep`的经验突出了这些优势。

title: Heretic: Automatic censorship removal for language models
summary:
Heretic is a tool for automatically removing censorship from transformer-based language models without requiring extensive post-training. It utilizes an enhanced directional ablation technique (abliteration) coupled with a TPE-based parameter optimizer (Optuna) to achieve this. The process is fully automated and aims to minimize both refusals to "harmful" prompts and the KL divergence from the original model, preserving the model's original intelligence.

Heretic's unsupervised operation rivals the quality of manually created abliterations, achieving similar refusal suppression with lower KL divergence, indicating less damage to the model's capabilities. It supports most dense models and various MoE architectures. Usage is straightforward, requiring a Python environment and a simple `pip install` command.

The core innovation lies in the parametrized directional ablation. The tool identifies relevant matrices within the transformer layers and orthogonalizes them with respect to "refusal directions" computed from the difference-of-means between "harmful" and "harmless" prompts. Optimization parameters control the ablation weight kernel's shape and position, allowing for a highly flexible approach to improve the compliance/quality tradeoff. The use of a floating-point refusal direction index allows linear interpolation between directions, expanding the search space for optimal performance. Ablation parameters are also chosen independently for each component (attention/MLP).

While acknowledging prior art in abliteration techniques, Heretic is written from scratch. The tool is licensed under the GNU Affero General Public License.

Heretic的无监督操作可与手动创建的abliteration质量相媲美，在实现类似拒绝抑制的同时，具有更低的KL散度，表明对模型能力的损害更小。它支持大多数密集模型和各种MoE架构。使用方法简单，只需一个Python环境和一个简单的`pip install`命令即可。

核心创新在于参数化的定向消融。该工具识别Transformer层中的相关矩阵，并根据从“有害”和“无害”提示之间的均值差异计算出的“拒绝方向”对它们进行正交化。优化参数控制消融权重核的形状和位置，从而实现高度灵活的方法来改善合规性/质量权衡。浮点拒绝方向索引的使用允许在方向之间进行线性插值，从而扩大了最佳性能的搜索空间。消融参数也针对每个组件（注意力/MLP）独立选择。

title: A file format uncracked for 20 years
summary:
The author details their attempt to reverse engineer the .lin file format used in the original Splinter Cell (2002) on the Xbox, a format that has remained largely uncracked for 20 years. Motivated by a desire to explore cut content, they backed up their game disc and started analyzing the .lin files.

The author initially identified the basic structure of the .lin files, noting zlib-compressed data chunks and a potential file table. They successfully wrote a tool to decompress the archives and discovered data sizes related to textures and buffers. However, difficulties arose when trying to parse the file table, which seemed to contain an excessive number of files with incorrect offsets.

Through debugging the game in the xemu emulator, the author located the functions responsible for file opening, reading, and decompression. They found that the game reads data linearly in 0x4000-byte chunks, ignoring seek commands, making the .lin format behave more like a linear stream of data. Further investigation revealed that Unreal Engine Package files exist in sequence.

The core issue remains the file table and its discrepancies. The author concludes that to properly read the files, one must assume no seeking and address the offset issues, which are likely related to how the data is loaded and managed during runtime.

核心问题仍然是文件表及其差异。作者得出结论，要正确读取文件，必须假设没有 seek 操作，并解决偏移量问题，这可能与运行时数据的加载和管理方式有关。

title: Listen to Database Changes Through the Postgres WAL
summary:
This article explores how to listen for database changes in Postgres using the Write-Ahead Log (WAL) as an alternative to `pg_notify`, which can become a performance bottleneck in high-throughput databases.

The WAL is a log of every database change, enabling functionalities like replication, backups, and Change Data Capture (CDC). To use the WAL for CDC, the `wal_level` must be set to `logical`, which stores changes in a high-level format, but may incur more overhead.

The article introduces Publications, which specify which tables and operations (inserts, updates, deletes) to track. Replication Slots are created to maintain a separate copy of the WAL for the listener, ensuring no data loss. Temporary replication slots are automatically deleted when the listener disconnects, preventing disk space issues, but can miss events if the listener is offline. Persistent replication slots guarantee no data loss but allow only one connection.

The article provides migration code snippets for creating a publication and a persistent replication slot. Creating both of these needs to be done in separate migrations. The first creates the publication that defines what tables to listen to, and the second creates a named replication slot for the listener.

WAL记录了每次数据库更改，从而实现复制、备份和变更数据捕获(CDC)等功能。要将WAL用于CDC，必须将`wal_level`设置为`logical`，这将以高级格式存储更改，但可能会产生更多开销。

title: Fastmcpp (Fastmcp for C++)
summary:
Fastmcpp is a high-performance C++ implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), mirroring the functionality of the Python fastmcp library. It supports core MCP features like tool management, resource handling, prompts, and JSON Schema validation, making it suitable for building MCP servers and clients with native performance.

Fastmcpp offers multiple transport layers, including STDIO, HTTP (SSE), and WebSocket, and includes middleware for request/response processing. It's cross-platform, supporting Windows, Linux, and macOS.

Building fastmcpp requires a C++17 compiler, CMake 3.20+, and the nlohmann/json library (automatically fetched). Optional dependencies include libcurl (for HTTP POST streaming) and cpp-httplib and easywsclient (for HTTP/WebSocket servers and clients). The project provides examples demonstrating basic usage, such as creating STDIO and HTTP servers, and HTTP clients.

The project structure consists of include directories with public headers, a source directory, a GoogleTest-based test suite, and example programs. Contributions are welcome, with guidelines emphasizing passing tests, adhering to code style, and updating documentation. It is licensed under Apache 2.0, and contributions can be directed to the Github issue tracker. The current version is 2.13.0 and is considered a Beta.

title: PicoIDE – An open IDE/ATAPI drive emulator
summary:
PicoIDE is an open-source hardware and firmware project created by Ian Scott that emulates IDE/ATAPI devices. It functions as both an ATAPI CD-ROM and an IDE fixed hard drive emulator. PicoIDE supports various image formats for CD-ROMs (.bin/.cue or .iso) and hard drives (.img/.hda/.vhd/.hdf). It features built-in CD audio output through a 3.5" jack and an MPC-2 header.

The device supports PIO modes 0-4 and multi-word DMA modes 0-2 for data transfer. Additionally, there's an option for a front panel or 3.5" drive bay enclosure which includes a 1.3" OLED screen (128x64), 4-way navigation buttons, WiFi connectivity for remote control and image management, and an RGB activity LED.

title: The fate of "small" open source
summary:
Nolan Lawson reflects on the impact of Large Language Models (LLMs) on the open-source ecosystem, specifically the fate of "small, low-value" libraries like his own `blob-util`. He notes that LLMs can now easily generate code for common tasks, reducing the need for such libraries and their associated dependencies.

Lawson acknowledges the potential benefits of this shift, such as faster development and more robust code. However, he also laments the loss of the educational aspect. Libraries like `blob-util` often served as learning tools, teaching developers fundamental JavaScript concepts beyond just solving a specific problem. He also questions the value of just putting documentation in an llms.txt file for an LLM.

He believes that while LLMs are making certain types of open-source projects obsolete, particularly utility libraries, they don't negate the need for open source entirely. He proposes that the future of open source lies in larger, more complex, and niche projects that LLMs can't readily reproduce. He cites his work on memory leak detection as an example of a valuable area where novel research and creative techniques are still essential.

Lawson remains optimistic, highlighting the continued development of new JavaScript frameworks despite LLMs' proficiency with existing ones. He concludes that LLMs have reshaped the landscape, but there's still ample opportunity for innovation and contribution in the open-source world, especially for projects that push boundaries and require human ingenuity.
chinese_title: “小型”开源的命运
chinese_summary:
诺兰·劳森反思大型语言模型（LLM）对开源生态系统的影响，特别是像他自己的`blob-util`这样“小型、低价值”库的命运。他指出，LLM现在可以轻松地为常见任务生成代码，从而减少对此类库及其相关依赖项的需求。

劳森承认这种转变的潜在好处，例如更快的开发和更强大的代码。然而，他也感叹教育方面的损失。像`blob-util`这样的库通常是学习工具，教开发者超越解决特定问题的基本JavaScript概念。他还质疑仅将文档放在LLM的llms.txt文件中有什么价值。

他认为，虽然LLM正在使某些类型的开源项目过时，特别是实用程序库，但它们并没有完全否定对开源的需求。他提出，开源的未来在于更大、更复杂、更小众的项目，这些项目LLM无法轻易复制。他以他在内存泄漏检测方面的工作为例，说明了新颖的研究和创造性技术仍然至关重要的有价值的领域。

劳森仍然保持乐观，强调尽管LLM精通现有的JavaScript框架，但新的JavaScript框架仍在不断开发。他总结说，LLM已经重塑了格局，但在开源世界中仍然有充足的创新和贡献机会，特别是对于那些突破界限并需要人类创造力的项目。

title: I finally understand Cloudflare Zero Trust tunnels
summary:
This article explains Cloudflare Zero Trust tunnels and Warp, contrasting them with Tailscale and outlining their benefits, such as connecting private networks, exposing services publicly or privately, and adding granular access control. It clarifies the roles of Cloudflared (tunnel creation) and Warp Client (client connection and policy enforcement).

The core concept revolves around Tunnels (entry/exit points to networks created by Cloudflared), Routes (directing traffic to specific tunnels, enabling private network access through Warp), and Targets (defining protected infrastructure, enabling access policies). The author uses the example of exposing a Home Assistant instance to illustrate these concepts.  Public access is enabled via DNS records pointing to Argo Tunnels. Private network access (e.g., 192.168.1.3) is achieved via Warp routes, which requires the Warp client to be connected.

Access Policies are crucial for defining who can access protected resources. The author demonstrates how to require specific login methods or bypass login when connected through Warp.

Finally, the article covers Warp client deployment and enrollment, highlighting settings to control client behavior, including allowed users, login methods, and protocol settings. Key is the Warp authentication identity setting to allow bypassing login screens for already enrolled users. The author emphasizes the importance of securing enrollment policies.
chinese_title: 我终于理解了Cloudflare Zero Trust 隧道。
chinese_summary:
本文阐述了 Cloudflare Zero Trust 隧道和 Warp，并将其与 Tailscale 进行对比，概述了它们的优势，例如连接私有网络、公开或私有地暴露服务以及添加精细的访问控制。文章阐明了 Cloudflared（隧道创建）和 Warp Client（客户端连接和策略执行）的角色。

核心概念围绕隧道（由 Cloudflared 创建的网络入口/出口点）、路由（将流量导向特定隧道，从而通过 Warp 实现私有网络访问）和目标（定义受保护的基础设施，从而启用访问策略）展开。作者以暴露 Home Assistant 实例为例来说明这些概念。 通过指向 Argo 隧道的 DNS 记录启用公共访问。 通过 Warp 路由实现私有网络访问（例如，192.168.1.3），这需要 Warp 客户端连接。

访问策略对于定义谁可以访问受保护的资源至关重要。 作者演示了如何要求特定的登录方法，或在通过 Warp 连接时绕过登录。

最后，本文介绍了 Warp 客户端的部署和注册，重点介绍了用于控制客户端行为的设置，包括允许的用户、登录方法和协议设置。 关键是 Warp 身份验证身份设置，允许为已注册的用户绕过登录屏幕。 作者强调了保护注册策略的重要性。

title: You can now buy pre-owned Ford vehicles on Amazon
summary:
Ford is now selling certified pre-owned vehicles on Amazon's new online car buying site, Amazon Autos, joining Hyundai as the second brand on the platform. Starting today, customers in Los Angeles, Seattle, and Dallas can browse, finance, and purchase these vehicles online, with in-person pickup at local Ford dealerships.

Unlike Hyundai's broader initial launch, Ford's offering is initially limited to these three cities, but Amazon anticipates expansion soon. Ford dealerships will retain control over pricing, service, and delivery, positioning Amazon as an intermediary connecting customers to these dealerships. Amazon aims to attract dealers by offering access to its vast user base of over 310 million active customers.

The vehicles sold on Amazon are certified pre-owned and backed by Ford's warranties, roadside assistance, and Ford Rewards points. Ford emphasizes that all vehicles listed have been inspected and reconditioned.

This move aims to improve the car buying experience, as many people find the traditional dealership experience frustrating. It contrasts with the direct-to-consumer (DTC) model pioneered by Tesla, which bypasses dealerships. However, laws in many states restrict manufacturers from selling directly to consumers, though this is beginning to change.
chinese_title: 你现在可以在亚马逊上购买二手福特汽车了。
chinese_summary:
福特现已在亚马逊新推出的在线汽车购买网站Amazon Autos上销售认证二手车，成为继现代之后第二个入驻该平台的品牌。从今天开始，洛杉矶、西雅图和达拉斯的客户可以在线浏览、融资和购买这些车辆，并在当地福特经销商处提货。

与现代最初更广泛的发布不同，福特的销售最初仅限于这三个城市，但亚马逊预计很快会扩展。福特经销商将保留对定价、服务和交付的控制权，亚马逊的角色定位为连接客户与这些经销商的中间人。亚马逊旨在通过提供访问其超过3.1亿活跃用户的庞大用户群来吸引经销商。

在亚马逊上销售的车辆均为认证二手车，并享有福特的保修、道路救援和福特奖励积分。福特强调，所有列出的车辆都经过了检查和翻新。

此举旨在改善购车体验，因为许多人觉得传统的经销商体验令人沮丧。这与特斯拉开创的直销模式（DTC）形成对比，后者绕过了经销商。然而，许多州的法律限制制造商直接向消费者销售，尽管这种情况正在开始改变。

title: The Pragmatic Programmer: 20th Anniversary Edition (2023)
summary:
Armand Halbert reviews the 20th Anniversary Edition of "The Pragmatic Programmer," highlighting its continued relevance for modern software engineers. The book, aimed at both beginners and experienced developers mentoring juniors, provides actionable advice applicable to software development and beyond.

Halbert emphasizes the book's structure, particularly the use of concise "tips" attached to the physical book for easy reference. He summarizes key concepts from the first three chapters. Chapter 1 stresses responsibility, adaptability, and continuous learning, highlighting the importance of communication and addressing "broken windows" in code. Chapter 2 focuses on pragmatic approaches like the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle, orthogonality, and the use of tracer bullets for iterative development. He slightly disagrees with the "no final decisions" tip, cautioning against over-abstraction. Chapter 3 covers essential tools and debugging strategies, advocating for plain text knowledge storage, command shell mastery, and systematic debugging techniques like the "binary chop" method. Chapter 4, starting with the idea that software can't be perfect, introduces the concept of Design by Contract.

Overall, the review positions the book as a valuable resource for software engineers at all stages, providing practical advice and timeless principles for effective and responsible software development.
chinese_title: 实用程序员：20周年纪念版 (2023)
chinese_summary:
阿芒·哈尔伯特评述《程序员修炼之道》20周年纪念版，强调其对现代软件工程师的持续价值。本书面向初学者和指导新人的资深开发者，提供适用于软件开发及其他领域的实用建议。

哈尔伯特强调了本书的结构，特别是便于参考的、附在实体书上的简洁“提示”。他总结了前三章的关键概念。第一章强调责任、适应性和持续学习，突出沟通的重要性以及解决代码中的“破窗效应”。第二章侧重于实用方法，如 DRY（不要重复自己）原则、正交性以及使用示踪弹进行迭代开发。他对“没有最终决定”的提示略有异议，告诫人们不要过度抽象。第三章涵盖了基本工具和调试策略，提倡使用纯文本存储知识、精通命令行 shell，以及像“二分法”这样的系统调试技术。第四章从软件不可能完美这一理念出发，介绍了契约式设计。

总而言之，该评论将本书定位为适合所有阶段软件工程师的宝贵资源，为高效和负责任的软件开发提供实用的建议和永恒的原则。

title: Why Castrol Honda Superbike crashes on (most) modern systems
summary:
This article details the author's debugging process of a 1998 PC game, Castrol Honda Superbike World Champions, which crashes on modern Windows systems but runs fine on older ones like Windows 98 and XP.

The author discovers the crash stems from a buffer overflow vulnerability in the game's DirectInput device enumeration code. The game allocates space for only 8 DirectInput devices, but enumerates all devices (keyboards, mice, LED controllers, etc.) connected to the system. When more than 8 devices are present, the game writes out of bounds, corrupting memory and causing a crash.

The author identifies the vulnerable callback function used by DirectInput and pinpoints the specific lines of code where the overflow occurs. The article highlights that the game only needs DirectInput for joysticks, and a simple fix would be to filter the device enumeration to only include joysticks.

To resolve the issue, the author creates a custom DLL shim that intercepts the `DirectInputCreateA` function. The shim then modifies the call to `EnumDevices` to filter for only joystick-type devices and also limits the number of processed joysticks to eight. This prevents the buffer overflow and allows the game to run correctly on modern systems.

The author also delves into extreme optimization techniques to minimize the size of the shim DLL, highlighting the various compiler and linker flags used to achieve a final size of just 2 KiB. A pre-compiled DLL is made available on the article's accompanying Github page. The author leaves True Color rendering issues in the game unaddressed.
chinese_title: 为什么嘉实多本田超级摩托车在（多数）现代系统上崩溃
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者对1998年PC游戏《嘉实多本田超级摩托车世界冠军赛》的调试过程。该游戏在现代Windows系统上崩溃，但在Windows 98和XP等旧系统上运行良好。

作者发现崩溃源于游戏DirectInput设备枚举代码中的缓冲区溢出漏洞。游戏仅为8个DirectInput设备分配空间，但会枚举连接到系统的所有设备（键盘、鼠标、LED控制器等）。当设备数量超过8个时，游戏会越界写入，破坏内存并导致崩溃。

作者确定了DirectInput使用的易受攻击的回调函数，并查明了溢出发生的特定代码行。文章强调，游戏只需要DirectInput用于操纵杆，一个简单的修复方法是过滤设备枚举，仅包括操纵杆。

为了解决这个问题，作者创建了一个自定义DLL垫片，拦截`DirectInputCreateA`函数。然后，该垫片修改了对`EnumDevices`的调用，以仅过滤操纵杆类型的设备，并将处理的操纵杆数量限制为8个。这可以防止缓冲区溢出，并使游戏能够在现代系统上正确运行。

作者还深入研究了极限优化技术，以最大限度地减小垫片DLL的大小，重点介绍了用于实现最终大小仅为2 KiB的各种编译器和链接器标志。文章配套的Github页面上提供了预编译的DLL。作者没有解决游戏中True Color渲染问题。

title: FPGA Based IBM-PC-XT
summary:
This article details a hobby project to recreate an IBM-PC-XT using an FPGA and a mix of original and modern components, with the goal of playing the EGA version of Monkey Island 1. The project leverages a low-power NEC V20 CPU, 1MB SRAM, and an icesugar-pro FPGA board. The custom-designed hardware includes PS/2 connectors for keyboard and mouse, a Micro SD card for fixed disk access, a YM3014B DAC for Adlib audio, and a piezo speaker.

The author describes the development process, starting with a bus controller for the V20 CPU implemented in Verilog. They discuss the memory management scheme, which involves loading the BIOS into FPGA block RAM and using a separate block RAM for video memory. A key challenge was implementing fixed disk access via an SPI controller and an option ROM for handling BIOS INT13H calls, as well as emulating the system in software.

The author tackled PS/2 mouse support by creating a PS/2 to Serial mouse bridge within the FPGA, using logic analyzer captures to understand the PS/2 protocol. Audio was enhanced by emulating hard disk seeking sounds and integrating Jose Tejada's open-source YM3812 implementation for Adlib audio, feeding it into the YM3014 DAC. The project included support for CGA and EGA graphics, a USB to UART bridge, and custom acrylic panels for enclosure. Source code, schematics, and Gerber files are available on GitHub.
chinese_title: 基于FPGA的IBM-PC-XT
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了一个使用FPGA和新旧组件混合重建IBM-PC-XT的业余项目，其目标是运行EGA版本的《猴岛小英雄1》。该项目利用了低功耗NEC V20 CPU、1MB SRAM以及icesugar-pro FPGA板。定制硬件包括用于键盘和鼠标的PS/2接口、用于固定磁盘访问的Micro SD卡、用于Adlib音频的YM3014B DAC以及压电扬声器。

作者描述了开发过程，从用Verilog实现的V20 CPU总线控制器开始。他们讨论了内存管理方案，包括将BIOS加载到FPGA块RAM中，并使用单独的块RAM作为显存。一个关键的挑战是实现通过SPI控制器和option ROM进行固定磁盘访问，以处理BIOS INT13H调用，以及在软件中模拟系统。

作者通过在FPGA内创建PS/2到串行鼠标桥接器来解决PS/2鼠标支持问题，并使用逻辑分析仪捕获来理解PS/2协议。通过模拟硬盘寻道声音并集成Jose Tejada的开源YM3812实现Adlib音频（并将其馈送到YM3014 DAC）来增强音频效果。该项目包括对CGA和EGA图形、USB到UART桥接器以及定制丙烯酸面板外壳的支持。源代码、原理图和Gerber文件可在GitHub上找到。

title: Neuroscientists track the neural activity underlying an “aha”
summary:
This article explores the neuroscience behind "aha" moments, or insights, and how they boost memory. Neuroscientist Maxi Becker used Mooney images (high-contrast, obscured pictures) and fMRI to track brain activity during these moments. The study revealed increased activity in the ventral occipitotemporal cortex (VOTC), amygdala, and hippocampus when participants correctly identified hidden objects in the images, particularly when the experience felt certain and emotionally positive. The hippocampus, known as the brain's "mismatch detector," plays a key role in recognizing the shift from a meaningless image to a meaningful one.

The research also investigated the "insight-memory advantage," finding that participants better remembered Mooney images they had experienced insightful moments with. Increased activity in the VOTC and hippocampus during the initial insight predicted better memory retention. This suggests that significant brain activity during insight makes the experience more salient, leading to better encoding in long-term memory.

While insights create stronger memories, the article notes they aren't always correct, with participants experiencing "aha" moments even when misidentifying the images. The article concludes by discussing the potential applications of understanding insight, particularly in education and understanding creativity. Researcher Yuhua Yu is exploring the role of insight in creativity and other domains, such as psychotherapy, meditation, and psychedelic experiences. The overall goal is to understand how to leverage insight to improve learning and creative problem-solving.
chinese_title: 神经科学家追踪“顿悟”背后的神经活动
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了“顿悟”时刻或洞察力背后的神经科学原理，以及它们如何增强记忆力。神经科学家马克西·贝克尔使用穆尼图像（高对比度、模糊的图片）和功能磁共振成像技术来追踪这些时刻的大脑活动。研究表明，当参与者正确识别出图像中隐藏的物体时，特别是当这种体验感觉确定且情绪积极时，腹侧枕颞皮层（VOTC）、杏仁核和海马体的活动会增加。海马体，被称为大脑的“失配探测器”，在识别图像从无意义到有意义的转变中起着关键作用。

该研究还调查了“顿悟-记忆优势”，发现参与者能够更好地记住他们有过顿悟时刻的穆尼图像。最初顿悟期间VOTC和海马体活动的增加预示着更好的记忆保持。这表明，顿悟期间显著的大脑活动使体验更加突出，从而导致在长期记忆中更好地编码。

虽然顿悟会产生更强的记忆，但文章指出它们并不总是正确的，参与者即使错误地识别图像也会体验到“顿悟”时刻。文章最后讨论了理解顿悟的潜在应用，特别是在教育和理解创造力方面。研究人员于玉华正在探索顿悟在创造力和其他领域中的作用，如心理治疗、冥想和迷幻体验。总体目标是了解如何利用顿悟来改善学习和创造性问题解决。

title: Z3 API in Python: From Sudoku to N-Queens in Under 20 Lines (2015)
summary:
This article is a tutorial on using the Z3 API in Python (Z3Py), a high-performance theorem prover from Microsoft Research. It covers the basics of Z3Py, including creating integer, real, and Boolean variables, defining constraints, and using the `solve` function to find solutions. The tutorial also explains how to simplify formulas, traverse expressions, and work with arbitrarily large numbers, rational numbers, and irrational algebraic numbers.

It demonstrates how to configure the Z3 environment using `set_option` and highlights common mistakes, such as treating Python integers as Z3 rationals. The tutorial then explores Boolean logic, showcasing operators like `And`, `Or`, `Not`, `Implies`, and `If`.

A section on Solvers explains the Z3 solver API, including adding constraints, checking satisfiability (`check`), and using `push` and `pop` to manage assertions. It also covers traversing constraints, collecting performance statistics, and inspecting models using `model()`.

Arithmetic capabilities are detailed, including the automatic coercion of integers to reals and simplification transformations using the `simplify` function. The article introduces bit-vectors for machine arithmetic and covers signed/unsigned operators like `ULT`, `ULE`, `UGT`, `UGE`, `UDiv`, `URem`, and `LShR`.

Finally, the tutorial introduces uninterpreted functions and constants, illustrating how to define and use them in constraint solving, along with evaluating expressions within a model using the `evaluate` method. The tutorial aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to Z3Py's core features for solving a wide range of problems.
chinese_title: Python中的Z3 API：20行内搞定数独到N皇后问题 (2015)
chinese_summary:
本文是一篇关于在 Python 中使用 Z3 API (Z3Py) 的教程，Z3Py 是来自微软研究院的高性能定理证明器。它涵盖了 Z3Py 的基础知识，包括创建整数、实数和布尔变量，定义约束以及使用 `solve` 函数查找解决方案。本教程还介绍了如何简化公式、遍历表达式以及处理任意大的数字、有理数和无理代数数。

它演示了如何使用 `set_option` 配置 Z3 环境，并强调了常见的错误，例如将 Python 整数视为 Z3 有理数。然后，本教程探讨了布尔逻辑，展示了诸如 `And`、`Or`、`Not`、`Implies` 和 `If` 等运算符。

关于求解器的章节解释了 Z3 求解器 API，包括添加约束、检查可满足性 (`check`) 以及使用 `push` 和 `pop` 管理断言。它还涵盖了遍历约束、收集性能统计信息以及使用 `model()` 检查模型。

详细介绍了算术能力，包括整数到实数的自动强制转换以及使用 `simplify` 函数进行的简化转换。本文介绍了用于机器算术的位向量，并涵盖了有符号/无符号运算符，如 `ULT`、`ULE`、`UGT`、`UGE`、`UDiv`、`URem` 和 `LShR`。

最后，本教程介绍了未解释的函数和常量，说明了如何在约束求解中定义和使用它们，以及使用 `evaluate` 方法在模型中评估表达式。本教程旨在为解决各种问题的 Z3Py 核心功能提供全面的介绍。

title: Fourier Transforms
summary:
This article is a critical look at the application and interpretation of Fourier Transforms (FFTs), particularly in the context of periodic data like that from rotating machinery or tires. The author argues that FFTs are often misused and misinterpreted, leading to erroneous conclusions.

The core point is that an FFT is fundamentally a curve-fitting process, specifically a multi-variable linear regression of sine and cosine functions to a given dataset. Therefore, it shouldn't be treated as a tool with "metaphysical abilities" to reveal hidden truths. Just because an FFT produces a harmonic at a specific frequency doesn't automatically mean the object was actually vibrating at that frequency.

The author uses a simple linear regression example (fitting a line to a quadratic function) to illustrate how easily misinterpretations can arise from curve-fitting results. He then explains the mathematical basis of FFTs, highlighting the key equations for calculating the amplitude and phase lag of each harmonic.

Several examples are presented, showing the FFT of basic functions like sine waves. These examples demonstrate that the FFT results can be complex and misleading if the data doesn't contain an integer number of cycles or if "zeroes" are added to the end of the signal. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding the limitations of FFTs and considering the full time signal when interpreting the results. Ignoring phase lag information is also pointed out as a potential source of misinterpretation. The overall message is to use FFTs with caution and critical thinking, recognizing them as a form of curve-fitting rather than a magical insight generator.
chinese_title: 傅里叶变换
chinese_summary:
对傅里叶变换(FFT)应用和解读的批判性审视：以旋转机械或轮胎等周期性数据为例。作者认为FFT常被误用和误解，导致错误的结论。

核心观点是，FFT本质上是一个曲线拟合过程，具体来说，是对给定数据集进行正弦和余弦函数的多变量线性回归。因此，不应将其视为具有“神秘能力”来揭示隐藏真相的工具。仅仅因为FFT在特定频率上产生谐波，并不意味着该对象实际上在该频率上振动。

作者使用一个简单的线性回归例子（用直线拟合二次函数）来说明曲线拟合结果如何容易产生误解。然后，他解释了FFT的数学基础，强调了计算每个谐波的幅度和相位滞后的关键公式。

文章展示了几个例子，包括正弦波等基本函数的FFT。这些例子表明，如果数据不包含整数个周期，或者在信号末尾添加了“零”，则FFT结果可能复杂且具有误导性。文章强调了理解FFT局限性的重要性，并在解释结果时考虑完整的时域信号。忽略相位滞后信息也被指出是误解的潜在来源。总而言之，要谨慎和批判性地使用FFT，将其视为一种曲线拟合形式，而不是神奇的洞察力产生器。

title: Mixing Is the Heartbeat of Deep Lakes. At Crater Lake, It's Slowing Down
summary:
This article discusses the slowing down of lake mixing in deep lakes, focusing on Crater Lake in Oregon as a prime example. Lake mixing, a crucial process driven by wind, temperature, and salinity, acts like a heartbeat, distributing oxygen and nutrients throughout the water column. However, climate change, with its warming temperatures and longer summers, is disrupting this process.

At Crater Lake, scientists have observed the water becoming clearer, which paradoxically indicates a problem. Warmer surface water temperatures lead to thinner warm water layers, reducing phytoplankton populations and thus increasing water clarity. More significantly, the article details that warmer nights are weakening the summer shallow mixing, and warmer winters are reducing the reverse stratification process that mixes the lake to the bottom. These changes lead to stratification, preventing oxygen and nutrient distribution.

The article highlights the importance of long-term data sets, such as the one from Crater Lake dating back to 1886, in understanding these changes. Similar mixing issues have been observed in Italian lakes, where a lack of oxygen at the bottom has transformed the biological communities. Crater Lake serves as a "canary in the coal mine," allowing researchers to study the impact of climate change on lake physics and potentially mitigate the consequences. Scientists are now emphasizing the need for a collaborative approach to studying lakes globally, as the impact of reduced mixing can lead to fish kills, algal blooms, and invasive species.
chinese_title: 深湖的混合是其命脉，火山口湖的混合正在减缓。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了深水湖泊混合减缓的现象，并以俄勒冈州的火山口湖为例。湖泊混合是一个由风、温度和盐度驱动的关键过程，如同心脏跳动，将氧气和养分分布到整个水体中。然而，气候变化，伴随着气温升高和夏季延长，正在扰乱这一过程。

在火山口湖，科学家观察到湖水变得更加清澈，但这反常地表明存在问题。较暖的表层水温导致较薄的暖水层，减少浮游植物种群，从而提高水的透明度。更重要的是，本文详细说明了较暖的夜晚正在削弱夏季的浅层混合，而较暖的冬季正在减少将湖水混合到底部的逆层化过程。这些变化导致分层现象，阻止氧气和养分的分布。

本文强调了长期数据集的重要性，例如火山口湖自1886年以来的数据，以便了解这些变化。在意大利湖泊中也观察到了类似的混合问题，底部缺氧已经改变了生物群落。火山口湖就像“煤矿里的金丝雀”，让研究人员可以研究气候变化对湖泊物理的影响，并有可能减轻后果。科学家们现在强调需要采取合作的方式来研究全球湖泊，因为混合减少的影响可能导致鱼类死亡、藻类大量繁殖和入侵物种。

title: App Lets ICE Track Vehicles and Owners Across the Country
summary:
A new app called Mobile Companion allows Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officers to instantly scan license plates, adding them to a database of billions of records detailing vehicle locations nationwide. This data, sourced from Motorola Solutions and Thomson Reuters, can be combined with driver's license information, credit header data, marriage records, vehicle ownership details, and voter registrations, enabling ICE to predict vehicle movements and collect face scans for facial recognition.

The app integrates with a desktop application called Vehicle Manager for analyzing and managing license plate data. Motorola, through its Vigilant Solutions and Digital Recognition Network (DRN) subsidiaries, uses fixed and mobile cameras, including those crowdsourced from repo men, to collect license plate data. Thomson Reuters' CLEAR platform enriches this data with comprehensive public and proprietary information, despite their claim that Mobile Companion has no relation to CLEAR.

While Thomson Reuters markets CLEAR for uses like rescuing abducted children and catching criminals, it doesn't highlight its use by ICE for deportation efforts. ICE continues to spend millions on Thomson Reuters for license plate reader data to aid in arrests and asset forfeiture. The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) and Motorola did not respond to requests for comment.

虽然汤森路透将 CLEAR 定位于解救被绑架儿童和抓捕罪犯等用途，但它并未强调 ICE 将其用于驱逐出境工作。ICE 继续花费数百万美元从汤森路透购买车牌读取器数据，以协助逮捕和没收资产。国土安全部 (DHS) 和摩托罗拉均未回复置评请求。

title: A new chapter begins for EV batteries with the expiry of key LFP patents
summary:
The expiry of key patents for Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) battery chemistry in 2022 has opened up the EV market, allowing broader access to this cost-effective, safe, and less toxic battery technology. While Tesla initially signaled the trend, LFP adoption is accelerating across Western markets, also gaining traction in renewable energy storage.

However, this isn't a free-for-all. While the core LFP chemistry is now public, companies are securing patents around secondary innovations like energy density enhancement, safety improvements, and fast-charging capabilities. Companies like CATL, BYD, and Tesla hold relevant patents in this area. Companies entering this space face potential infringement risks related to secondary patents covering additives, coatings, and production methods, necessitating careful Freedom-to-Operate (FTO) analysis.

Beyond patents, challenges remain. LFP batteries' lower material value poses recycling challenges, particularly with upcoming EU regulations requiring recycled lithium content. Western manufacturers are also heavily reliant on Chinese suppliers for key materials and manufacturing expertise. Furthermore, infrastructure like charging stations need improvement to promote EV adoption.

The patent expiry marks the beginning of a new phase of innovation. Competitive advantage now lies in further technological advancements, requiring strategic patent and trade secret protection, alongside strategic partnerships. EV companies will have to navigate a landscape where effective IP protection strategies are key to success.

title: Supercookie: Browser Fingerprinting via Favicon (2021)
summary:
This article describes "Supercookie," a novel browser fingerprinting technique that utilizes favicons to create a persistent and difficult-to-clear unique identifier for website visitors. Unlike traditional tracking methods using cookies, this method leverages the browser's favicon cache (F-Cache) and circumvents common anti-tracking measures like incognito mode, VPNs, ad blockers, and clearing browser data.

The technique works by exploiting the way browsers request favicons. If a favicon for a specific URL path isn't in the F-Cache, the browser requests it from the server. By strategically delivering or not delivering favicons for different subpaths, the server can create a unique pattern (the supercookie) for each browser based on which favicons are requested. This pattern can be reconstructed upon subsequent visits, identifying the user even after clearing cookies and employing privacy tools.

The article highlights the vulnerability of major browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge, including their mobile versions. It explains how the attack can be scaled to distinguish a large number of users. Mitigation strategies currently involve manually deleting the favicon cache files. The author emphasizes that the demonstration and source code are for educational purposes, aiming to raise awareness about favicon-based tracking possibilities. The project has gained attention from various tech news outlets and security experts.
chinese_title: Supercookie：通过网站图标进行浏览器指纹识别 (2021)
chinese_summary:
本文描述了一种名为“超级Cookie”的新型浏览器指纹识别技术，该技术利用网站图标（favicon）为网站访问者创建一个持久且难以清除的唯一标识符。与使用Cookie的传统跟踪方法不同，此方法利用浏览器的网站图标缓存（F-Cache），并绕过常见的反跟踪措施，如隐身模式、VPN、广告拦截器和清除浏览器数据。

该技术通过利用浏览器请求网站图标的方式来工作。如果特定URL路径的网站图标不在F-Cache中，浏览器会向服务器请求。通过策略性地传递或不传递不同子路径的网站图标，服务器可以根据请求了哪些网站图标，为每个浏览器创建一个唯一的模式（超级Cookie）。该模式可以在后续访问中重建，即使在清除Cookie和使用隐私工具后也能识别用户。

本文重点介绍了Chrome、Firefox、Safari和Edge等主流浏览器（包括其移动版本）的漏洞。它解释了如何扩展攻击以区分大量用户。目前的缓解策略包括手动删除网站图标缓存文件。作者强调，演示和源代码仅用于教育目的，旨在提高人们对基于网站图标的跟踪可能性的认识。该项目已引起多家科技新闻媒体和安全专家的关注。

title: I have recordings proving Coinbase knew about breach months before disclosure
summary:
In January 2025, the author experienced a sophisticated scam where attackers possessed detailed personal information, including their social security number and exact Bitcoin balance, suggesting a data breach at Coinbase. They immediately reported the incident to Coinbase, providing a detailed technical analysis of the phishing email, including suspicious email headers indicating it originated from Amazon SES instead of Coinbase's secure channels, and a recording of the fraudulent call. Despite acknowledging the report as "super robust," Coinbase failed to investigate or respond to the author's critical question about how the attackers obtained their sensitive data.

Four months later, in May 2025, Coinbase publicly disclosed a breach where cybercriminals bribed overseas customer support contractors at TaskUs in India to steal customer data. The compromised information included names, addresses, SSN digits, IDs, account balances, and transaction histories. Coinbase estimated the financial impact at $180-400 million.

The author argues that Coinbase knew about the breach months before the public disclosure, as their experience in January and subsequent report provided concrete evidence of compromised data being actively used. They criticize Coinbase for outsourcing security-sensitive roles, failing to detect the breach earlier, providing inadequate responses to user reports, and potentially delaying the disclosure. The author also highlights the sophisticated nature of the scam, including the use of a Google Voice number, attempts to get them to move funds to Coinbase Wallet, and SMS flooding to hide security alerts.
chinese_title: 我有录音证明Coinbase在披露前数月就知道违规行为。

作者认为，Coinbase在公开披露前几个月就知道该漏洞，因为他们1月份的经历和随后的报告提供了具体证据，表明被盗数据正在被积极使用。作者批评Coinbase外包安全敏感职位、未能更早地发现漏洞、对用户报告的回复不足以及可能延迟披露。作者还强调了诈骗的复杂性，包括使用Google Voice号码、试图让作者将资金转移到Coinbase Wallet，以及使用短信轰炸来隐藏安全警报。

title: Anthropic’s paper smells like bullshit
summary:
The article criticizes a recently published report by AI research company Anthropic, regarding a supposed cyber espionage operation by a Chinese state-sponsored group (GTG-1002) leveraging their AI assistant, Claude, for penetration testing. The author, "djnn," argues the report lacks crucial technical details and verifiable evidence, rendering it useless for security professionals aiming to detect or prevent similar attacks.

The core complaint is the absence of Indicators of Compromise (IoCs), TTPs, and other specific markers that would allow security teams to validate the claims and protect their networks. The author finds assertions like Claude independently executing 80-90% of tactical operations unsubstantiated and questions the tooling used, the type of data extracted, and the nature of affected systems.

"djnn" emphasizes that attribution to a Chinese state-affiliated group without providing supporting details is irresponsible and could have diplomatic implications. They suspect the report's primary purpose is to promote Anthropic's AI-powered security solutions, highlighting a concluding paragraph that encourages security teams to "experiment with applying AI for defense."

In conclusion, the author views the report as a "pathetic excuse" and a "shameless attempt at selling more of their product," lacking ethical consideration for providing actionable intelligence and relying on hype over substance. "djnn" calls for the industry to demand higher standards from tech companies, particularly regarding fact-based evidence and verifiable information in cybersecurity reports.
chinese_title: Anthropic 的论文闻起来像坨屎。

核心的抱怨是缺乏入侵指标（IoCs）、战术、技术和程序（TTPs）以及其他具体的标记，这些本可以帮助安全团队验证声明并保护他们的网络。作者发现诸如Claude独立执行80-90%战术行动之类的说法毫无根据，并质疑所使用的工具、提取的数据类型以及受影响系统的性质。

“djnn”强调，在没有提供支持细节的情况下将行为归因于中国官方背景的组织是不负责任的，并可能产生外交影响。他们怀疑该报告的主要目的是为了推广Anthropic的AI驱动的安全解决方案，并特别指出了鼓励安全团队“尝试应用AI进行防御”的结尾段落。

总而言之，作者认为该报告是“可悲的借口”和“无耻的推销产品的行为”，缺乏提供可操作情报的伦理考量，并且依赖炒作而非实质。“djnn”呼吁业界要求科技公司提高标准，尤其是在网络安全报告中提供基于事实的证据和可验证的信息方面。

title: AirPods libreated from Apple's ecosystem
summary:
LibrePods is a project aiming to unlock the full potential of Apple's AirPods on non-Apple devices, specifically Android and Linux. It allows users to access features typically locked within the Apple ecosystem, such as noise control modes, ear detection, battery status, and customizable transparency modes.

Currently, AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) are fully supported, while other models have varying levels of functionality. The software offers customizations like renaming AirPods and modifying long-press actions. Some advanced features, like hearing aid customization and multi-device connectivity, require a Bluetooth Device Identification (DID) hook, achieved by mimicking an Apple device ID.

On Android, LibrePods generally requires a rooted device with Xposed due to a Bluetooth stack issue, although ColorOS/OxygenOS 16 users can access basic features without root. The DID hook is enabled through Xposed. The project is under active development, with a new Linux version in progress.

Key points include:

*   **Brings AirPods features to Android and Linux.**
*   **Requires root on Android (generally) for full functionality.**
*   **Offers noise control, ear detection, battery status, and more.**
*   **Includes advanced features via Bluetooth DID hook.**
*   **Free and open-source under the GNU GPL v3 license.**

title: Dark Pattern Games
summary:
Dark pattern games use deliberately manipulative design choices to negatively impact players while benefiting the game developer. These aren't just unintentional design flaws; they are purposeful tactics designed to exploit player psychology. The core principle is to trick or pressure players into actions that they might not otherwise take, such as spending real money, playing for longer than intended, or sharing the game with others.

These tactics can manifest in various forms. Examples include using artificial scarcity to create a fear of missing out (FOMO), implementing deceptive pricing strategies, making in-game purchases seem easier or more necessary than they actually are, and obscuring important information about the true cost or time commitment involved in progressing through the game. Essentially, game developers use these design tricks to maximize profits or engagement at the expense of player enjoyment and potentially, financial well-being.
chinese_title: 暗黑模式游戏
chinese_summary:
恶意游戏设计利用刻意操控的设计选择，在让玩家遭受负面影响的同时，使游戏开发者获益。这些并非无意的设计缺陷，而是旨在利用玩家心理的有目的的策略。其核心原则是欺骗或迫使玩家采取他们可能不愿采取的行动，例如花费真金白银、游戏时间超出预期或与他人分享游戏。

这些策略可以表现为多种形式。例如，利用人为稀缺性来制造错失恐惧症（FOMO），实施欺骗性定价策略，使游戏内购买看起来比实际更容易或更必要，以及掩盖有关游戏进展所涉及的真实成本或时间投入的重要信息。本质上，游戏开发者使用这些设计技巧来最大限度地提高利润或参与度，但代价是玩家的乐趣，甚至可能是财务健康。

title: Quest for Permissively Licensed PDF Library in C#
summary:
This article details the author's quest to find a permissively licensed C# PDF rendering library that doesn't rely on a full browser engine. The author emphasizes the difficulty of layouting and styling in PDF creation, which often leads to using browser engines like Chromium.

The article outlines desirable features for a PDF solution: DOM representation, layout/styling capabilities, PDF format writing, and format translation. While many libraries can write PDFs, few offer layout and styling under a permissive license.

QuestPDF is highlighted as a promising, modern library with an MIT license for its code, though the project license differentiates between free and commercial use.

The author then provides an exhaustive list of PDF-related libraries, categorized by their functionality (DOM, Layout, PDF Renderer, Browser Engine), along with license information and suitability for the author's goals. Libraries like MigraDoc, PdfPig, LiteHtmlSharp, HTML Agility Pack, PDFSharp, and various HTML-to-PDF converters are assessed.

Ultimately, MigraDoc is identified as the best fit, despite its limitations in advanced styling and potential memory usage. While not perfect, it offers a "good enough" solution for many common PDF export scenarios. The author notes the surprising lack of strong, permissively licensed PDF rendering contenders in the open-source world and expresses interest in creating glue code to facilitate interoperability between existing .NET PDF libraries.
chinese_title: C#中寻找许可宽松的PDF库
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者寻找一个不依赖完整浏览器引擎的、许可证宽松的 C# PDF 渲染库的探索过程。作者强调了 PDF 创建中布局和样式设计的难度，这通常导致人们使用像 Chromium 这样的浏览器引擎。

文章概述了一个理想的 PDF 解决方案应具备的特性：DOM 表示、布局/样式功能、PDF 格式写入和格式转换。虽然许多库可以写入 PDF，但很少有库在宽松许可下提供布局和样式设计。

QuestPDF 被强调为一个有前景的现代库，其代码采用 MIT 许可证，但项目许可区分了免费和商业用途。

作者随后提供了一个详尽的 PDF 相关库列表，按其功能（DOM、布局、PDF 渲染器、浏览器引擎）进行分类，并附带许可证信息以及是否适合作者的目标。MigraDoc、PdfPig、LiteHtmlSharp、HTML Agility Pack、PDFSharp 以及各种 HTML 到 PDF 转换器等库都经过了评估。

最终，MigraDoc 被确定为最合适的选择，尽管它在高级样式设计和潜在内存使用方面存在局限性。虽然不完美，但它为许多常见的 PDF 导出场景提供了“足够好”的解决方案。作者指出，在开源世界中，令人惊讶地缺乏强大的、许可证宽松的 PDF 渲染竞争者，并表示有兴趣创建胶水代码以促进现有 .NET PDF 库之间的互操作性。

title: Garbage collection is useful
summary:
This devlog recounts how knowledge of garbage collection, specifically the principles from the paper "A Unified Theory of Garbage Collection," proved useful in solving a problem related to incremental parsing with Ohm and ProseMirror.

The author was working on a system where text document edits in ProseMirror need to be synchronized with the original text document, leveraging Ohm's incremental parsing and transform capabilities. The challenge was efficiently identifying which nodes from the old parsed document were no longer present after an edit, without traversing the entire document, which would negate the benefits of incremental parsing.

Initially, the approach mirrored tracing garbage collection by iterating over the entire new document to identify live nodes and determine the difference from the previous document's nodes.  However, inspired by "A Unified Theory of Garbage Collection," which posits tracing and reference counting as dual approaches, the author implemented a reference counting mechanism.

Instead of tracing live objects, they focused on "anti-matter" (dead objects). Upon creating a new document after an edit, the reference count of the old root node (and subsequently its children) is decremented recursively. This efficiently identifies the nodes no longer in use, allowing for targeted updates without needing to traverse the entire document. This reference counting approach mirrors a reference counting garbage collector and successfully addressed the performance bottleneck of the original implementation.
chinese_title: 垃圾回收很有用
chinese_summary:
此开发日志讲述了垃圾回收的知识，特别是论文《垃圾回收的统一理论》中的原则，如何被证明在解决与Ohm和ProseMirror增量解析相关的问题中是有用的。

作者正在开发一个系统，该系统需要将ProseMirror中文本文档的编辑与原始文本文档同步，并利用Ohm的增量解析和转换功能。面临的挑战是如何有效地识别编辑后旧解析文档中不再存在的节点，而无需遍历整个文档，否则将抵消增量解析的好处。

最初，该方法模仿追踪垃圾回收，通过迭代整个新文档来识别活动节点，并确定与先前文档节点的差异。然而，受到《垃圾回收的统一理论》的启发，该理论认为追踪和引用计数是对偶方法，作者实现了一种引用计数机制。

他们没有追踪活动对象，而是专注于“反物质”（死亡对象）。在编辑后创建新文档时，旧根节点（以及随后的其子节点）的引用计数会递归地递减。这有效地识别了不再使用的节点，从而可以进行有针对性的更新，而无需遍历整个文档。这种引用计数方法模仿了引用计数垃圾收集器，并成功解决了原始实现中的性能瓶颈。

title: Linux mode setting, from the comfort of OCaml
summary:
This article introduces libdrm-ocaml, an OCaml library providing a more user-friendly interface to the Linux Kernel Mode Setting (KMS) API for configuring display settings. The author demonstrates how to use libdrm-ocaml interactively within a REPL (like utop) to query and modify display configurations.

The article walks through the process of discovering available graphics devices, listing resources like connectors, CRTCs (CRT Controllers), encoders, framebuffers, and CRTC planes. It details how to retrieve information about connected monitors, supported modes, and resource properties. The author explains the relationships between these resources, providing a simplified diagram for clarity.

The author showcases how to enable atomic mode setting to access additional properties, highlighting the importance of handling optional values using OCaml's `Option` type. They also explain how framebuffers provide image data to CRTCs and touch on the concept of CRTC planes, which allow combining multiple framebuffers for display.

The article briefly mentions making changes to the display configuration using non-atomic and atomic mode setting. It touches on using "dumb buffers" and alludes to 3D rendering using the API, indicating the potential for more advanced graphics manipulation. The article offers insight into the underlying KMS API, even for readers unfamiliar with OCaml. Finally, the author provides instructions on how to install and run the code examples.
chinese_title: 用 OCaml 轻松设置 Linux 模式

本文介绍 libdrm-ocaml，一个 OCaml 库，它为配置显示设置提供了一个更友好的 Linux 内核模式设置 (KMS) API 接口。作者演示了如何在 REPL (例如 utop) 中以交互方式使用 libdrm-ocaml 来查询和修改显示配置。

本文简要提到了使用非原子和原子模式设置来更改显示配置。它涉及使用“哑缓冲区”，并暗示使用该 API 进行 3D 渲染，表明其具有进行更高级图形操作的潜力。即使对于不熟悉 OCaml 的读者，本文也提供了对底层 KMS API 的深入了解。最后，作者提供了有关如何安装和运行代码示例的说明。

title: Our investigation into the suspicious pressure on Archive.today
summary:
This article details AdGuard DNS's investigation into suspicious pressure exerted on Archive.today (Archive.is). AdGuard was contacted by the Web Abuse Association Defense (WAAD), a newly formed French organization, demanding they block Archive.today due to alleged refusal to remove illegal content, threatening legal action under French law.

Suspecting foul play, AdGuard contacted Archive.today directly, who promptly removed the cited content and claimed they had never received prior notifications. Archive.today also revealed a pattern of "serial" complaints targeting the site.

AdGuard's investigation into WAAD revealed that the organization was recently registered, lacked substantial public information, and had a minimal online presence. Further, the "bailiff reports" provided by WAAD as evidence were mostly created in August 2025, not 2023 as claimed. However, two of the bailiff reports were ordered in 2023 by someone whose name matched a person Archive.today wrote about in 2024. In that case, the complaint came from what looked like a real lawyer - but the domain was registered on the same day the complaint was sent, containing only a redirect to the lawyer's page.

AdGuard concludes that the complaints against Archive.today appear suspicious and potentially involve impersonation. They are filing an official complaint with the French police, citing the penalty for false reports under French law. The article also notes the timing of these events coincides with an FBI investigation into Archive.today, potentially related to CSAM, though no direct connection is confirmed.
chinese_title: 对 Archive.today 可疑压力的调查
chinese_summary:
AdGuard DNS调查Archive.today受可疑压力事件。AdGuard收到一个新成立的法国组织Web Abuse Association Defense (WAAD)的联系，对方要求其屏蔽Archive.today，理由是后者拒绝删除非法内容，并威胁将根据法国法律采取法律行动。

AdGuard怀疑存在不正当行为，直接联系了Archive.today，后者迅速删除了引用的内容，并声称从未收到过事先通知。Archive.today还透露存在针对该网站的“连续”投诉模式。

AdGuard对WAAD的调查显示，该组织最近才注册，缺乏实质性的公开信息，且在线存在感极低。此外，WAAD提供的作为证据的“执达吏报告”大多创建于2025年8月，而非声称的2023年。然而，有两份执达吏报告是2023年由某人订购的，此人的名字与Archive.today在2024年写到的人相符。在这种情况下，投诉似乎来自一位真正的律师，但该域名是在发送投诉的同一天注册的，仅包含一个重定向到律师页面的链接。

AdGuard得出结论，针对Archive.today的投诉似乎存在可疑之处，可能涉及冒名顶替。他们正在向法国警方提起正式投诉，理由是根据法国法律对虚假报告的处罚。文章还指出，这些事件发生的时间恰逢FBI对Archive.today进行调查，可能与CSAM有关，但尚未确认直接联系。

title: Measuring the doppler shift of WWVB during a flight
summary:
This article details the author's exploration of using the WWVB 60 kHz time signal as a frequency reference and a fun radio project. The author highlights the advantages of WWVB over alternatives like GPSDOs, including its indoor usability and simpler design. He also discusses the benefits of using HackRF Pro for this project, specifically its more accurate TCXO compared to HackRF One.

The article describes the design and development of "Teewee," a small active loopstick antenna for receiving WWVB, and the challenges faced in mitigating interference, particularly from nearby electronic devices. The author explains the characteristics of the WWVB signal, including its ASK and BPSK modulation.

The most exciting part of the project involved measuring the Doppler shift of WWVB during a flight across Canada. By analyzing the captured WWVB frequency over time, the author was able to observe the Doppler effect caused by the aircraft's motion relative to the transmitter. Confirmation was achieved by correlating the observed Doppler shift with ADSB flight data, revealing a small frequency offset due to the HackRF Pro's TCXO. The author was unable to get the same data on the return flight due to interference from the avionics.

The author concludes by inviting readers to build their own Teewee antenna, emphasizing its compatibility with HackRF Pro and mentioning some limited success with HackRF One.
chinese_title: 飞行中测量WWVB的多普勒频移
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者探索使用WWVB 60 kHz时间信号作为频率参考和趣味无线电项目的过程。作者强调了WWVB相对于GPSDO等替代方案的优势，包括其室内可用性和更简单的设计。他还讨论了使用HackRF Pro进行此项目的优势，特别是其TCXO比HackRF One更准确。

文章描述了“Teewee”的设计和开发，这是一种用于接收WWVB的小型有源环形天线，以及在减轻干扰（特别是来自附近电子设备的干扰）方面面临的挑战。作者解释了WWVB信号的特性，包括其ASK和BPSK调制。

该项目最令人兴奋的部分是测量加拿大境内飞行期间WWVB的多普勒频移。通过分析捕获的WWVB随时间变化的频率，作者能够观察到飞机相对于发射器运动引起的多普勒效应。通过将观察到的多普勒频移与ADSB飞行数据相关联，确认了该效应，并揭示了由于HackRF Pro的TCXO引起的微小频率偏移。由于航空电子设备的干扰，作者无法在返程航班上获得相同的数据。

作者最后邀请读者构建自己的Teewee天线，强调其与HackRF Pro的兼容性，并提到使用HackRF One取得的一些有限成功。

title: Goto Considered Harmless
summary:
This article, "Goto Considered Harmless," challenges the long-held belief that `goto` statements are inherently bad programming practice, popularized by Edsger Dijkstra. The author argues that the historical context of Dijkstra's concerns is crucial and that modern programming languages mitigate the problems he highlighted.

The author references a video showcasing `goto` statements in the Linux kernel, defending their use with the argument that opinions about `goto` are often religious rather than technical. Dijkstra's original concern stemmed from the observation that excessive `goto` usage made code difficult to follow, hindering a programmer's ability to understand the execution flow. He advocated for structured programming with constructs like `if` and `while` to create a more predictable and traceable execution path.

The article's central point is that modern languages, unlike those available during Dijkstra's time, have restrictions on `goto` usage that address his concerns. Specifically, the author demonstrates with a C example that `goto` statements can only jump to labels within the same procedure, preventing the chaotic, unrestricted jumps Dijkstra feared. This limitation preserves procedural abstractions and allows for structured programming practices, even with the presence of `goto`. Therefore, the author concludes that `goto`, in its modern, constrained form, is no longer as harmful as it once was considered.
chinese_title: Goto 被认为无害
chinese_summary:
"Goto Considered Harmless" 这篇文章挑战了埃德斯格·迪科斯彻推广的长期以来认为 `goto` 语句本质上是不良编程实践的观点。作者认为，迪科斯彻担忧的历史背景至关重要，并且现代编程语言减轻了他所强调的问题。

作者引用了一个展示 Linux 内核中 `goto` 语句的视频，并辩称关于 `goto` 的观点通常是宗教式的而非技术性的，以此来捍卫它们的使用。迪科斯彻最初的担忧源于观察到过度使用 `goto` 会使代码难以理解，从而妨碍程序员理解执行流程的能力。他提倡使用结构化编程，使用 `if` 和 `while` 等结构来创建更可预测和可追踪的执行路径。

文章的中心论点是，与迪科斯彻时代可用的语言不同，现代语言对 `goto` 的使用有限制，从而解决了他的担忧。具体来说，作者用一个 C 语言的例子证明，`goto` 语句只能跳转到同一过程中的标签，从而防止了迪科斯彻担心的混乱、不受限制的跳转。这种限制保留了过程抽象，并允许结构化编程实践，即使存在 `goto`。因此，作者得出结论，`goto` 以其现代的、受约束的形式，不再像曾经被认为的那样有害。

title: The evolution of rationality: How chimps process conflicting evidence
summary:
This article explores research by Jan M. Engelmann and colleagues on the evolution of rationality, specifically how chimpanzees process conflicting evidence and revise their beliefs. The researchers conducted five experiments involving food puzzles to assess chimpanzees' ability to make rational decisions.

The initial experiments showed that chimps could change their choices based on new evidence, especially when weak initial evidence was followed by strong counter-evidence. Later experiments revealed more complex cognitive abilities. Chimpanzees considered all available options, demonstrating a basic understanding of evidence hierarchy. They also recognized redundant evidence, suggesting they create mental representations of the information. Most impressively, the final experiment demonstrated that chimpanzees could understand "second-order evidence," recognizing when evidence might be misleading and adjusting their choices accordingly.

Across all experiments, the chimps followed the evidence significantly above chance, indicating a degree of rationality. Engelmann argues that rationality exists on a spectrum, with chimpanzees exhibiting rudimentary forms, and more advanced reflective rationality seen in chimps and potentially bonobos. While he believes humans possess a "social rationality" through collaborative discussion, he also acknowledges that social influences can sometimes lead to irrationality. Interestingly, preliminary research suggests chimpanzees are less susceptible to social irrationality, as they only follow the decisions of other chimps with superior evidence. The study provides crucial insight into the evolutionary origins of rational thought.
chinese_title: 理性的演变：黑猩猩如何处理冲突证据
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了Jan M. Engelmann及其同事关于理性进化的研究，特别是黑猩猩如何处理冲突证据并修正其信念。研究人员进行了五项涉及食物谜题的实验，以评估黑猩猩做出理性决策的能力。

最初的实验表明，黑猩猩可以根据新的证据改变他们的选择，尤其是在微弱的初始证据之后出现强烈的反证时。后来的实验揭示了更复杂的认知能力。黑猩猩考虑了所有可用的选项，展示了对证据层级的基本理解。他们还认识到冗余证据，表明他们创建了信息的心理表征。最令人印象深刻的是，最后的实验表明黑猩猩可以理解“二阶证据”，认识到证据可能具有误导性，并相应地调整他们的选择。

在所有实验中，黑猩猩遵循证据的程度显著高于偶然，表明存在一定程度的理性。Engelmann认为，理性存在于一个谱系中，黑猩猩表现出初级形式，而更高级的反射性理性则出现在黑猩猩以及可能倭黑猩猩身上。虽然他认为人类通过协作讨论拥有“社会理性”，但他也承认社会影响有时会导致非理性。有趣的是，初步研究表明黑猩猩不太容易受到社会非理性的影响，因为它们只遵循拥有更优证据的其他黑猩猩的决定。该研究为理性思维的进化起源提供了重要的见解。

title: "Snarky"; "Snark"
summary:
This article explores the definition, etymology, and rise in popularity of the words "snarky" and "snark." It begins by defining "snarky" as sarcastic, impertinent, or irreverent and "snark" as a noun or verb referring to mocking irreverence and sarcasm. The author notes a significant increase in the use of both words in recent decades, citing examples from the 1990s.

The piece then delves into the origins of the word "snark." While some believe it stems from Lewis Carroll's poem, the article clarifies that it has roots in Scottish and Shetland dialects, where "snark" meant to snore, fret, or grumble. It also notes a connection to "nark," meaning an annoying person. The first cited uses of "snark" as a verb and "snarky" as an adjective are traced back to the early 20th century writings of E. Nesbit. Further British examples from the early 1900s are cited, before the word crossed the Atlantic to appear in American literature around 1915.

The article specifies that "snark" as a noun didn't emerge until the late 1980s. Finally, it suggests that the recent popularity of "snarky" may be due to its sound resembling a combination of "sarcastic" and "snarl," aligning with the current cultural climate.
chinese_title: 讽刺
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了“snarky”和“snark”这两个词的定义、词源以及流行度的上升。文章首先将“snarky”定义为讽刺的、无礼的或不敬的，而“snark”则作为名词或动词，指代嘲弄的不敬和讽刺。作者指出，近几十年来，这两个词的使用量显著增加，并引用了20世纪90年代的例子。

接下来，文章深入研究了“snark”一词的起源。虽然有些人认为它源于刘易斯·卡罗尔的诗歌，但文章澄清说，它起源于苏格兰和设得兰群岛的方言，在这些方言中，“snark”的意思是打鼾、烦躁或抱怨。文章还指出了它与“nark”（意为讨厌的人）的联系。文章追溯了“snark”作为动词和“snarky”作为形容词的首次使用，均可追溯到20世纪初伊迪丝·内斯比特的作品中。文章还引用了20世纪初的其他英国例子，之后该词跨越大西洋，大约在1915年出现在美国文学作品中。

文章明确指出，“snark”作为名词直到20世纪80年代后期才出现。最后，文章认为“snarky”最近的流行可能归因于其发音类似于“sarcastic”（讽刺的）和“snarl”（咆哮）的组合，与当前的文化氛围相符。

title: Lithium vs. Lettuce
summary:
This article explores the looming conflict between agriculture and lithium mining in California's Imperial Valley, a region that produces a significant portion of the US's winter produce. The Imperial Valley, despite its agricultural productivity, faces economic challenges like high unemployment.

The valley's agricultural success is attributed to the All-American Canal, providing on-demand water. However, it's also home to the Salton Sea, an ecological disaster caused by agricultural runoff. Farmers like Trevor Tagg struggle with rising costs and regulations, leading to farm closures and a lack of young people entering the industry. He laments the decline of agriculture due to California's policies.

Meanwhile, the region is on the cusp of a lithium mining boom, with companies like Controlled Thermal Resources (CTR) aiming to extract lithium from geothermal brine beneath the Salton Sea. This "white gold rush" has the potential to transform the region's economy, but also raises concerns about the impact on existing industries and the labor market, as exemplified by beekeeper Bryan Ashurst's concerns.

While lithium mining promises economic benefits and cleaner extraction methods (like CTR's closed-loop system), uncertainty remains regarding its impact on the local community, water resources, and the future of Imperial Valley's agricultural heritage. The article highlights the tension between feeding the nation and fueling the electric vehicle revolution, questioning whether both can coexist sustainably in this unique desert landscape.
